name: Knights Templar
startIntroPart1: In the name of God, we march once more.
startIntroPart2: The world awaits our return, as we reclaim what was once ours.
declaringWar: You have forsaken the righteous path. Now, face the wrath of the Templar. We come for you.
attacked: You think to challenge God's chosen? We stand together, undaunted. Your reckoning begins now.
defeated: We may fall, but God's will endures. Our sacrifice is His, and His judgment shall find you, in this life or the next.
introduction: In the name of God, we greet you. May your people walk a path of honor and faith, for our eyes are ever watchful.

neutralLetsHearIt: Speak your mind. We are listening.

hateLetsHearIt: We shall hear your words, though they are likely to be filled with lies.
